result.reason: Middle-click on panel tab closes all panels instead of just the targeted one — standard browser UX bug, already fixed in commit 7770dd5f0
result.approach: Add MiddleClickCloseTab method that closes only the tab at the hit-test index via QueueCloseTab, instead of closing all panels — already implemented and tested
